snippet.title: Metal Gear (NES) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A complete playthrough of Ultra's 1988 NES game, Metal Gear.

Even if Kojima wants to complain about it because of his lack of involvement in the development, Metal Gear is not quite the same as the original MSX version, but it is the first game that many of us in the US ever got a chance to try out Snake's brand of "tactical espionage action." 

______
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
